value:
select 
cast(max_sid as integer) as max_sid,
cast(src_sys_cd as varchar(10)) as src_sys_cd,
cast(policyholder_id as varchar(35)) as policyholder_id,
cast(policyholder_name as varchar(255)) as policyholder_name,
cast(address_desc as varchar(150)) as address_desc,
cast(postal_cd as varchar(10)) as postal_cd,
cast(region_cd as varchar(10)) as region_cd,
cast(region_name as varchar(100)) as region_name,
cast(comuna_cd as varchar(10)) as comuna_cd,
cast(comuna_name as varchar(35)) as comuna_name,	
cast(city_cd as varchar(10)) as city_cd,
cast(city_name as varchar(35)) as city_name,
cast(cntry_cd as varchar(10)) as cntry_cd,
cast(cntry_desc as varchar(80)) as cntry_desc,
cast(policyholder_rut_num as varchar(35)) as policyholder_rut_num,
cast(actv_rec_ind as varchar(1)) as actv_rec_ind,
cast(etl_audit_id as integer) as etl_audit_id,
cast(gender_cd as varchar(10)) as gender_cd,
cast(gender_desc as varchar(80)) as gender_desc,
birth_dt,
cast(person_type_cd as varchar(10)) as person_type_cd,
cast(person_type_desc as varchar(80)) as person_type_desc
from (
select 
LKP_MAXSID.MAX_SID AS MAX_SID,
src.* from (
select
'penta' as src_sys_cd,
0 as policyholder_id,
stg_informeventas.policyholder_name,
null as address_desc,
null as postal_cd,
null as region_cd,
null as region_name,
null as comuna_cd,
null as comuna_name,
null as city_cd,
null as city_name,
null as cntry_cd,
null as cntry_desc,
stg_informeventas.policyholder_rut_num,
'Y' as  actv_rec_ind,
cast(0 as integer) as etl_audit_id,
null as gender_cd,
null as gender_desc,
cast(null as date) as birth_dt,
null as person_type_cd,
null as person_type_desc,
1 as dummy
from (SELECT distinct 
rut_contratante as policyholder_rut_num,
trim(nombre_contratante) as policyholder_name
FROM cdp_stg_dwh.stg_informeventas WHERE trim(codigo_ramo)='24') stg_informeventas
where policyholder_rut_num not in 
(select distinct policyholder_rut_num from cdp_dwh.dim_policyholder_t where src_sys_cd='penta')
) src
left outer join
(select 1 as dummy, max(dim_policyholder_key) as MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_policyholder_t) LKP_MAXSID
on src.dummy = LKP_MAXSID.dummy
)

name: Pre-sql
value:
DELETE FROM CDP_DWH.dim_policyholder_t
WHERE src_sys_cd='penta' and etl_audit_id=0;
